# GlobalCoordinateSpace

**Structure**

The global coordinate space at the root of the view hierarchy.

## Declaration

```swift
struct GlobalCoordinateSpace
```

## Creating the coordinate space

- **init()**

## Supporting types

- **LocalCoordinateSpace**: The local coordinate space of the current view.
- **NamedCoordinateSpace**: A named coordinate space.

## Conforms To

- CoordinateSpaceProtocol

items.description: The local coordinate space of the current view.
items.name: LocalCoordinateSpace
